message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its unique features and high quality, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $2000000. We understand that the true value of this product may vary based on your needs, so please let us know if this offer meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on your product, I believe there might be room for negotiation given my budget constraints. I am interested in purchasing the product, but I can only offer $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
